alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 11 at 3:02PM EST until March 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...West Carteret and East Carteret Counties, and Northern Outer Banks, Ocracoke Island and Hatteras Island. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island; West Carteret
